comment.text: The "DeveloperToolsAccess" translation key is used to display the title and description of a section in the Portal Settings application. This text appears as a category title and brief description within a settings page, providing context about developer tools access.

usage.context:
<TrustedMailSection {...settingsBeforeInvitationSettingsProps} />
 <StyledSettingsSeparator />
 
 <Text fontSize="16px" fontWeight="700">
 {t("DeveloperToolsAccess")}
 </Text>
 <div className="category-item-description">
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400">
 {t("DeveloperToolsAccessDescription", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),

{
 id: "portal-settings_catalog-access-dev-tools",
 key: "1-0-3",
 icon: "",
 link: "access-dev-tools",
 tKey: "DeveloperToolsAccess",
 },
 {
 id: "portal-settings_catalog-ip-security",
 key: "1-0-4",
 icon: "",

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation 'وصول محدود إلى أدوات المطورين' translates to 'Limited access to developer tools'. While not entirely incorrect, it doesn't directly convey 'Developer Tools section'. It emphasizes access rather than the section itself. A more accurate translation would be something closer to 'قسم أدوات المطورين' (Developer Tools Section).

The translation "Məhdud Tərtibatçı alətlərinə giriş" is too literal and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Developer Tools section."  'Məhdud' means 'limited' which isn't the intended meaning. 'Tərtibatçı' is a more general term for 'developer' or 'engineer,' whereas 'Developer Tools' refers to a specific set of tools. 'Giriş' means 'access', but a more natural phrasing would imply the section itself, not just access to it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation would be something like "Proqram Tərtibatçı Alətləri Bölməsi" or "Proqram Tərtibatçı Alətləri Seksi".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Ограничен достъп до Програмни инструменти" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Developer Tools section". It translates to "Restricted access to Programming Tools". The original phrase refers to a *section* within a settings menu, not restricted access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something along the lines of "Раздел с инструменти за разработчици" or "Секция инструменти за разработчици".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Omezený přístup k nástrojům pro vývojáře" (Restricted access to developer tools) doesn't accurately reflect "Developer Tools section". It implies limited access, whereas the English phrase simply refers to the location of the developer tools within a settings menu.

The German translation 'Eingeschränkter Zugriff auf Entwicklertools' (Restricted Access to Developer Tools) doesn't accurately reflect 'Developer Tools section'. It implies limited access, while the original refers to the section itself.

The translation "Περιορισμένη πρόσβαση στα εργαλεία προγραμματιστών" translates to "Restricted access to developer tools". While not entirely wrong, it's more restrictive than the English "Developer Tools section" which simply refers to the location of the developer tools. It implies access is limited, whereas the English doesn't.

The Finnish translation 'Rajatut kehittäjän työkalut-oikeudet' is too literal and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Developer Tools section'. 'Rajatut' implies restricted, which isn't the core meaning. The translation is overly formal and complex.
The hyphenated word 'työkalut-oikeudet' creates a disjointed feel.  It is likely unnecessary and confusing.

The translation "Accès limité aux outils de développement" doesn't accurately reflect the English phrase "Developer Tools section". It translates to "Limited access to development tools" which is more restrictive than a mere section.

The translation 'Ծրագրավորողի գործիքների սահմանափակ հասանելիություն' translates to 'Limited access to developer tools'. The English content 'Developer Tools section' refers to the specific area within an application or system. The Armenian translation implies a restriction or limitation which isn't conveyed in the original English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ըստ էության, մոտենալու ավելի ստույգ թարգմանությունը կարող է լինել «ծրագրավորողի գործիքներ բաժին» (T'srgravori gorts'niki bajeen) or simply «ծրագրավորողի գործիքներ» (T'srgravori gorts'kner).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation 'Accesso limitato agli strumenti per sviluppatori' is a bit too literal and doesn't quite convey the meaning of 'Developer Tools section' accurately. It translates to 'Limited access to developer tools'. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing in Italian for a UI element label.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'Strumenti per sviluppatori' or 'Sezione strumenti sviluppatori'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '制限された開発者ツールへのアクセス' (Restrictions on access to developer tools) is too literal and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Developer Tools section'. It implies access restriction, not simply the location of the tools.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 開発者ツールセクション (Kaihatsusha Tsu-ru Sekushon) - This uses a katakana transliteration for 'section' which is common for UI elements and maintains a more accurate representation of the English meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation '제한된 개발자 도구 액세스' translates to 'Restricted Developer Tools Access'. This isn't a direct or accurate translation of 'Developer Tools section'. It implies a restriction, which might not be the intended meaning. The section itself may not be restricted, but simply contain developer tools.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like '개발자 도구 섹션' (Developer Tools Section) or '개발자 도구' (Developer Tools) depending on the context of its usage.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ເຄື່ອງມືຂອງນັກພັດທະນາ" translates to "Tools of the developer". While not entirely wrong, it's a more literal translation and doesn't capture the nuance of a 'section' within settings. A more accurate translation would be closer to "Developer Tools" or "Developer Tools Section".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "ເຄື່ອງມືຂອງນັກພັດທະນາ" (if 'Tools' is acceptable) or "ພາກສ່ວນເຄື່ອງມືຂອງນັກພັດທະນາ" (Developer Tools Section).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation "Ierobežota piekļuve Izstrādātāja rīkiem" translates to "Restricted access to Developer Tools". While not entirely wrong, it implies a limitation, whereas the English "Developer Tools section" simply refers to the location of those tools. A more accurate translation would convey the concept of a section or area, not restricted access.

The Polish translation 'Ograniczony dostęp do narzędzi dla programistów' translates to 'Restricted access to developer tools'. While not entirely wrong, it's more verbose and less direct than 'Developer Tools section'.  'Sekcja narzędzi dla programistów' or 'Narzędzia dla programistów' would be more accurate and concise.

The translation "Acesso Limitado às Ferramentas do Programador" is too literal and doesn't convey the meaning of "Developer Tools section" accurately. It implies restricted access, while the original refers to the presence of a section.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like "Seção de Ferramentas do Desenvolvedor" or "Ferramentas para Desenvolvedor".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Acesso limitado às ferramentas do desenvolvedor" is too literal and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Developer Tools section". It implies restricted access, whereas the original refers to the location of the tools.
The suggested translation should ideally match the casing of 'Ferramentas do Desenvolvedor' in the UI (e.g., title case).

The translation 'Acces limitat la Instrumente pentru dezvoltatori' is a bit too literal and doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'Developer Tools section'. 'Acces limitat' implies restricted access, while the English phrase refers to the presence of a dedicated section. It's not necessarily about restricted access.

The translation 'Ограниченный доступ к инструментам разработчика' (Restricted access to developer tools) doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of 'Developer Tools section'. It implies a restriction, whereas the English phrase refers to a specific location or area.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Раздeл 'Инструменты разработчика' or 'Инструменты для разработчиков' would be more accurate.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'සංවර්ධක මෙවලම් අංශය' while generally accurate, could be more directly translated as 'Developer Tools' or 'Developer Tools section' to maintain consistency with the original English phrase. 'අංශය' (ashaya) implies a department or division, which might be too specific.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නිර්මාණකරුවන්ගේ මෙවලම් (Nirmanakaruwan Ge Mewalam) or නිර්මාණකරුවන්ගේ මෙවලම් කොටස (Nirmanakaruwan Ge Mewalam Kotas)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Obmedzený prístup k nástrojom pre vývojárov' (Restricted access to developer tools) is too literal and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Developer Tools section'. It implies a restriction, while the English phrase simply refers to a specific part of the settings.

The translation 'Omejen dostop do orodij za razvijalce' translates to 'Restricted access to developer tools'. While technically correct, it doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Developer Tools section'. It implies a restriction, whereas the original phrase simply refers to a section within a larger system. A more accurate translation might focus on the 'section' aspect.

The translation "Ограничен приступ алаткама за програмере" does not accurately reflect the meaning of "Developer Tools section". It translates to something like "Restricted access to developer tools". The original phrase refers to a section within settings, not restricted access.
The word "алаткама" is technically correct but slightly awkward in this context. It's the dative plural of "алatка" (tool). A more natural phrasing might avoid the dative case.

The translation 'Ograničen pristup alatkama za programere' (Restricted access to developer tools) doesn't accurately reflect the English phrase 'Developer Tools section'. It implies access restriction, while the original refers to a section within a larger interface. A more appropriate translation would focus on the 'section' aspect.

The Turkish translation "Sınırlı Geliştirici Araçları erişimi" translates to "Limited Developer Tools access". While not entirely wrong, it implies a restriction, whereas the English "Developer Tools section" simply refers to the location of the tools. It's more of a descriptive label, not a restricted access designation.

The translation "Обмежений доступ до інструментів розробника" (Restricted access to developer tools) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Developer Tools section." It implies restricted access, whereas the original refers to a section or area within a larger interface.

The Vietnamese translation "Quyền truy cập công cụ dành cho Nnhà Phát Triển có giới hạn" is an overly literal and slightly awkward translation of "Developer Tools section." It emphasizes 'limited access' which isn't inherent to the English phrase. "Nhà Phát Triển" is also missing a vowel at the beginning (should be "Nhà Phát Triển")
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Phần công cụ dành cho nhà phát triển

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese phrase "Nnhà Phát Triển" contains a typo. It should be "Nhà Phát Triển".

The translation '受限的开发者工具访问' (Shòu xiàn de kāi fā zhě gōng jù fǎng wèn) translates to 'Restricted developer tools access'. This doesn't accurately reflect the English phrase 'Developer Tools section'. The English refers to a section within an application or system, whereas the translation implies a restriction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 开发者工具区 (Kāi fā zhě gōng jù qū) - Developer Tools area/section
